description:
The Leo Institute is looking to take over Yuya’s duel school, and they’re bringing 3 of their most dangerous duelists to take down whoever dares stand in their way!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Duel School`s Crisis! LDS` Attack
Yuushou Juku no Kiki!! LDS Shuurai
遊勝塾の危機!! LDS襲来
